Posted By: Chrome_Coyote (9/24/2010 3:17:58 PM)

@Necrosage_Disel: It has a Mirran watermark because it's a natural inhabitant of Mirrodin that's unaffiliated with Phyrexia.

@LeafWheels: In most cases, when a creature card names itself, it means "this creature". For example, if Ashling the Pilgrim was in a graveyard, Necrotic Ooze would have "1R: Put a +1/+1 counter on Necrotic Ooze ".
Tarox Bladewing is different though. If it said "Discard a card named Tarox Bladewing," then you'd definitely have to discard a card with that exact name. But since it says "Discard another card named Tarox Bladewing," it implies that the name of the creature and that of the card ought to be the same. But what if they aren't? The wording is ambiguous to me. I'll have to look this one up at some point.

@VoidedNote: It doesn't work with level up creatures in the way that you want it to. The only activated ability it copies is the "Level up" ability itself, and not the "if you have x or more level counters, the creature has these abilit... (see all)

Posted By: Leshrac_Nightwalker (10/1/2010 1:56:38 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
From the comprehensive rules PDF.  
  
*201.4b If an ability of an object refers to that object by name, and an object with a different name  
gains that ability, all instances of the first name in the gained ability should be treated as the  
second name.*  
  
So if you have a myr propagator in the graveyard and a necrotic ooze in play, the ability gained by the ooze should for all intents and purposes read,   
  
3, Tap: Put a token that's a copy of *necrotic ooze* onto the battlefield.  
  
So... Many.... Combos.... .!. (head explodes).
posts.html:
From the comprehensive rules PDF.

201.4b If an ability of an object refers to that object by name, and an object with a different name
gains that ability, all instances of the first name in the gained ability should be treated as the
second name.

So if you have a myr propagator in the graveyard and a necrotic ooze in play, the ability gained by the ooze should for all intents and purposes read,

3, Tap: Put a token that's a copy of necrotic ooze onto the battlefield.

So... Many.... Combos.... .!. (head explodes).
